channel.title: Tricky question, 508 Bulby
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm adding a new skill to my server, and I'd like to have the total level that is shown be correct.
So, with 99 everything EXCEPT the new skill in a 508, the total level is 2376.
Now, if i get 99 in the new skill, the total level stays at 2376, when it should be 2475.
So basically, I would like to change what is shown in the red box:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2qxuc6e.jpg[/img]
